required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: IPH4102 Alone or in Combination With Chemotherapy in Patients With Advanced T Cell Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: TELLOMAK: T-cell Lymphoma Anti-KIR3DL2 Therapy. An Open Label, Multicohort, Multi-center Phase II Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of IPH4102/Lacutamab Alone or in Combination With Chemotherapy in Patients With Advanced T-cell Lymphoma

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, multi-cohort, and multi-center phase II study, which evaluates the clinical activity and safety of IPH4102 in Sezary Syndrome and Mycosis fungoides as single agent, and in patients with peripheral T-cell lymphoma in combination with gemcitabine and oxaliplatin chemotherapy (GEMOX)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
primary_outcome.description: Using the Olsen (2011, JCO) criteria (Cohorts 1-3), or Lugano Criteria (Cohorts 4-5)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and tolerability)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: patients with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an expected average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Using the Skindex29 questionnaire to assesse the effects of skin disease on quality of life in three domains: Symptoms, Emotions, and Functioning

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an expected average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Using Visual Analog Scale (VAS) for prutitus assessment: From 0 = No pruritus to 10 = Pruritus as bad as it could possibly be

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameters : Maximum Plasma Concentration of IPH4102 alone (Cohorts1-3) or in combination with GEMOX (Cohorts 4 and 5);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameters :Trough Concentration of IPH4102 alone (Cohorts1-3) or in combination with GEMOX (Cohorts 4 and 5);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity of IPH4102 alone (Cohorts1-3) or in combination with GEMOX (Cohorts 4 and 5);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: A serum sample will be collected at the specified time points for evaluation of anti-drug antibodies (ADA).

secondary_outcome.measure: The impact of treatment on minimal residual disease (MRD) (Cohort 1).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose until study completion, an expected average of 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: A whole blood sample will be collected at the specified time points for evaluation of MRD

arm_group.description: IPH4102 will be administered every week for 5 weeks then every 2 weeks for 10 administrations then every 4 weeks until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Cohort 2: Stage IB-IV Mycosis Fungoides, KIR3DL2 expressing
arm_group.description: IPH4102 will be administered every week for 5 weeks then every 2 weeks for 10 administrations then every 4 weeks until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Cohort 3: Stage IB-IV Mycosis Fungoides,KIR3DL2 non-expressing
arm_group.description: IPH4102 will be administered every week for 5 weeks then every 2 weeks for 10 administrations then every 4 weeks until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Cohort 4: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 expressing
arm_group.description: IPH4102 will be administered every week for 5 weeks then every 2 weeks for 10 administrations then every 4 weeks until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity. GEMOX will be administered every 2 weeks for a maximum of 8 cycles

arm_group.arm_group_label: Cohort 5: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 non-expressing
arm_group.description: IPH4102 will be administered every week for 5 weeks then every 2 weeks for 10 administrations then every 4 weeks until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity. GEMOX will be administered every 2 weeks for a maximum of 8 cycles

intervention.description: Patients will receive a flat dose of 750mg
intervention.arm_group_label: Cohort 2: Stage IB-IV Mycosis Fungoides, KIR3DL2 expressing
Cohort 3: Stage IB-IV Mycosis Fungoides,KIR3DL2 non-expressing
Cohort 4: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 expressing
Cohort 5: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 non-expressing

intervention.description: Patients will receive a dose ranging from 800-1000 mg/m2 of gemcitabine and 75-100mg/m2 of oxalipatin, according to local practice .
intervention.arm_group_label: Cohort 4: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 expressing
Cohort 5: Peripheral T-cell lymphoma, KIR3DL2 non-expressing
